PRODUCERS: Willie Mitchell and Al Green ENGINEER: Willie Mitchell REMIX ENGINEER: Willie Mitchell VOCAL BACKGROUNDS: Rhodes, Chalmers and Rhodes STRING ARRANGEMENTS: James Mitchell and Charles Chalmers STRING SECTION: The Memphis Strings HORN SECTION: Wayne Jackson-Trumpet; Andrew Love-Tenor, Ed Logan-Tenor; James Mitchell-Baritone Sax; Jack Hole-Trombone RHYTHM SECTION: Howard Grimes, Al Jackson-Drums, Congas, & Bongo; Leroy Hodges-Bass; Charles Hodges-Organ and Piano; Teenie Hodges-Guitar, Archie Turner & Michael Allen-Piano RECORDED AT: Royal Recording Studios, Memphis TN THIS DISC CONTAINS THE ORIGINAL QUADRAPHONIC MIXES FROM A 7.5 I.P.S. QUAD REEL SOURCE
